ship.name: Breed's Ship
ship.description: An aquarium-like vessel used to house Breed's enslaved sea creatures and animals.

keyMoments.title: Breed Pirates Defeated
keyMoments.description: Breed is defeated by Luffy and the Kung-fu Dugong, effectively ending the Breed Pirates' operations.
keyMoments.significance: The defeat of Breed marks the end of his criminal enterprise and frees all enslaved animals.

goals: Enslave living beings using the Peto Peto no Mi
Create a world full of controllable animals using SMILE fruits
Build a powerful crew of enslaved sea creatures

keyMoments.title: Sea Animal Pirates Introduction
keyMoments.description: The crew is introduced as enslaved pirates under Breed's control, having been captured when they reached the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that the Kung-fu Dugong followed Luffy's example and formed his own pirate crew during the timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Breaking Free from Breed
keyMoments.description: The Sea Animal Pirates break free from Breed's control through willpower and help restrain him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's strength and unity in overcoming forced enslavement.

keyMoments.title: Freed and Continuing Their Journey
keyMoments.description: Now free from Breed's control, the Sea Animal Pirates say goodbye to Luffy and continue their pirate journey.
keyMoments.significance: The crew is able to pursue their dreams of adventure, inspired by Luffy's example from Alabasta.

goals: Sail the seas as free pirates
Follow Luffy's example of pursuing dreams
Reach the New World and have adventures
